name: Yellow Pages Business Listings
special_instructions: One of search term or location must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
The 'Extend output function' is a JavaScript function that takes jQuery instance and a data object as input, and extends the data object with new fields
The 'Start URLs' is an array of URLs where the actor should start the scraping. This is useful if you want to scrape a specific set of businesses
The 'Max items' is the maximum number of business listings that the actor should scrape
Always set proxyConfiguration : {  "useApifyProxy": false    } unless you have a specific need to use a proxy
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any privacy or any other limit
